mapper.select: select cm.*, ci.url1, ci.url2 from cafe_members cm2 left outer join cafe_master cm on cm.cafeNo=cm2.cafeNo left outer join cafe_detail cd on cm.cafeNo=cd.cafeNo left outer join cafe_image ci on ci.imageNo = cd.mainImageNo where cm2.userID=#{userID};

select cp.*, cm.cafeName, cl.regionNo from cafe_public_meeting cp left outer join cafe_location cl on cp.locationNo=cl.No left outer join cafe_master cm on cp.cafeNo=cm.cafeNo where cp.meetingDate >= NOW()
